name: Island Of Hope (Raoph)
description:
Alone, lost in the big blue, you will have only yourself to survive, and build a raft to find your way back to the main land. Only yourself I said ?

On this Island, few other people ran agground their ship through the years, and are facing the same fate as you

You're not alone !
  •  Move with WASD
  •  Action button is LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

    • Lost, they will need someone to tell them what to do to escape ! You can assign other NPC's task like getting wood or food, by clicking on the button above them

    Your goal is still the same, build a raft to escape together, but do not forget to feed you, and your people

    Have fun !
